course.subject: MATH
course.name: Reading Course: Spectral Theory of Differential Operators
course.description: In this reading course, we give a detailed overview of the techniques and results of the analysis of systems of ordinary differential equations with periodic coefficients, with particular emphasis on the spectral theory of Sturm-Liouville and Dirac operators. Students should seek the course instructorâ€™s approval to take this course.
